author: Artoria2e5
body:
THIS IS ONLY A DRAFT. I AM HERE FOR THE CI RESULTS ON WINDOWS AND STUFF.

# PR Summary

* do what #13089 says. consolidate and fix cmdline escaping.
* remove the empty string check. native commands can accept empty arguments!
* attempt wildcard on all barewords, not just these without spaces.

fix #1995

## PR Context

See #1995, #13089, #13098.
